Google unveils TensorFlow tool for making mobile-ready models
Google has announced TensorFlow Lite Model Maker, a tool for converting an existing TensorFlow model to the TensorFlow Lite format used to serve predictions on lightweight hardware such as mobile devices. TensorFlow models can be quite large, and serving predictions remotely from beefy hardware capable of handling them isn’t always possible.
